author: Fred Imbert
title: Dow futures drop more than 200 points as Wall Street gives back some of last week's gains
description: Futures opened lower on Sunday night following sharp gains last week while the number of coronavirus cases in the U.S. keeps rising at an alarming rate.
content:
U.S. stock futures opened loweron Sunday night following sharp gains last week while the number of coronavirus cases in the U.S. keeps rising at an alarming rate.
Dow Jones Industrial Average futures fell more than 300 points, or 1.8%. S&P 500 and Nasdaq… [+3216 chars]
